wikipedia_page.main: Paul Armstrong (born 27 October 1965) is a Scottish retired football forward who played in the Scottish League, most notably for Stirling Albion and Queen's Park.

response: * Paul Armstrong (Irish footballer) (born 1978), Irish football midfielder
* Paul Armstrong (Scottish footballer) (born 1965), Scottish football forward
* Paul Armstrong (Australian footballer) (born 1957), Australian rules football player and administrator
